pack.name: Carbs of the Huge Manatee - Kink Expansion 1

black.content: “Mrs. Robinson, you want me to provide ______ and ______ for this affair?”

Who's to say that love needs to be soft, gentle, and sweet?  Not when it can involve ______...
Why am I wet?

You have ______?!  Oh my god! Put it in my mouth!!!
